name: Panther Claw
text: You unleash a rapid series of blows on foes that attempt to attack you when you move.
prerequisites: Wis 15, Combat Reflexes, Improved Unarmed Strike, Panther Style.
benefit: While using Panther Style, you can spend a free action, instead of spending a swift action, to make a retaliatory unarmed strike. You can make a number of retaliatory unarmed strikes on your turn equal to your Wisdom modifier.
staminaText: When making a retaliatory strike, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to gain a bonus on the damage roll equal to double the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 你在移动中以眼花缭乱之势反击攻向你的敌人。
prerequisites_zh: 感知15，战斗反射，精通徒手打击，豹形拳。
benefit_zh: 你处于豹拳流派架势时，你可以用自由动作进行对借机攻击的反击。你在你的行动轮中可以做出等同你感知修正次数的反击。
staminaText_zh: 当你做出一次反击时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来在伤害骰上获得等同于你消耗耐力两倍的加值。
